settings.title: M-Technology
settings.subheading: THE MOST ADVANCED MATERIALS WITH A DASH OF MAD SCIENCE

settings.title: Lens Geometry
settings.content: The optical design of each base curve lens is Ai enhanced 3 axis optical correction for prismatic distortion and refractive power.  This is coupled with custom blended optical grade materials for ultimate clarity and reduced internal haze, along with easy surpassing the highest mil spec for impact resistance

settings.title: Plasmachromatic
settings.content:
Utilizing a Plasma Vapor Deposition (PVD) mirror
coating process where positively charged metal
ions are drawn to negatively charged lenses using
ionic polar attraction. These mirrored lenses reflect
light, reducing glare and eye strain while giving
you privacy.

settings.title: EYE FENCE
settings.content:
M Carbon backed impact resistant lenses
protects your eyes from flying debris,
UV rays, and other hazards..

settings.title: RES+
settings.content:
High-Definition optical clarity reduces distortion and offers a wider field of view, creating a
superior and more optical experience.

settings.title: POLARIZED
settings.content:
Our high-performance polarized lenses block
99.9% of reflective glare for the most vivid and
detailed visual experiences.

settings.title: DAUL CHAMBER INFUSION
settings.content: A multi-stage mold process using fiberglass reinforced TR90 substrate parts in Gigawatt, resulting in a stiff chassis in and around the hinge while maintaining flexibility and skin feel in the nose and ear areas for comfort.

settings.title: LENS CLUTCH
settings.content: Lens quick release system giving you the fastest, most secure method to switch lenses.

settings.title: RATCHETING NOSE PIECE
settings.content: Adjustable nose piece system designed for different nose sizes and provides a secure, non-slip fit.

settings.title: SLICS
settings.content: Ear pads engineered with Atomic 14 providing maximum comfort and non-slip grip.

settings.title: M Carbon
settings.content: Proprietary frame material made from TR90 polymer. A semitransparent polyamide providing superior heat resistance and durability, in addition to exceptional strength and crack resistance.

settings.title: Atomic 13
settings.content:
Carefully selected lightweight blend of 13Al that incorporates trace elements of Cu (Copper), Mg (Magnesium), Mn (Manganese)
and Si (Silicon).  Each is precisely blended by Alcoa to impart qualities of toughness, lightness, and strength.

settings.title: Thermo Carbon
settings.content: This molecule is slowly injected through large channels into precision lens molds to prevent breaking submicroscopic polymer chains, delivering proven impact resistance, maximum optical clarity, and superior lens durability.

settings.title: ATOMIC 14
settings.content: Polydimethylsiloxane technology that nestles the 14Si atom at repeating intervals into a polymer chain, delivering a high comfort, no-slip grip capable of anchoring your eyewear to your face with maximum comfort.

settings.title: M-Technology
settings.subheading: THE MOST ADVANCED MATERIALS WITH A DASH OF MAD SCIENCE

settings.content:
Lens Technology

  • Lens Geometry: Ai assisted 3 axis correction for prismatic distortion and refractive power.
  • Plasma (Plasmachromatic): Precision coatings reflect light, reducing glare and eye strain.
  • Polarized: High- performance coating blocking 99.9% of reflective glare.
  • Eye Fence: Impact resistance for maximum eye protection.
  • Res+: Ultra-Definition optical clarity reducing distortion while offering a wider field of view.

Materials

  • M Carbon: Proprietary frame material providing superior heat resistance and durability.
  • Atomic 13: Blended Aluminum used for toughness, lightness, and strength.
  • Thermo Carbon: Delivers proven impact resistance, maximum optical clarity and durability.
  • Atomic 14: Smooth silicone delivering high comfort and non-slip grip.

settings.subheading: A multi-stage mold process using fiberglass reinforced TR90 substrate parts in Gigawatt, resulting in a stiff chassis in and around the hinge while maintaining flexibility and skin feel in the nose and ear areas for comfort.
